Since end of June is peak season in Genoa, we would strongly suggest to secure your accommodation as soon as possible. We contacted a few hotels which guaranteed a convenient rate for reservations done before the end of the year 2022. Contact details and a code to access these rates will be provided to people who pre-register. Accomodations can be found here and B&B options here.
